column1: I really really love you let me explain why, I love that you loved me after knowing just for 3 days.
I love you how much you love dance, I love that,  you use to talk to me  late night when you had school in the  next morning.
I love that you dont give a fuck, that you never feel like arrogant about the things you have. I love that you wear makeup rarely
and be natural all those years, I also love that when you wear makeup you own it like a movie star. I love you so much for that
once when we were giving nick name volcano. I love that when we had crazy conversations at night talking about ground rules
that never existed. I love that when you caught by parents you could have end relationship, you didnt giveup and push through
problems to continue relationship and made it stronger,I love that....  I love that you're such a trouble maker. I love that your parents
treated me nice in 2014 at mani aunt's home. I love that how chill you are when you called me to bedroom in mani aunt's home.
I love that you are so cute when you sent few audio recordings. I love that you are like a  champion,  while participated in Ananda Mela dance
program. I am really sorry that I am such a jerk, all those years and for everything I did that  hurted you. I cant wait to bring you here and marry you,
